name: Clusterbloom Arrow
description: End Phase: Deal 1 Dendro DMG to the opposing character that has taken the least DMG. Repeat this once for each stack you have, then reduce 1 stack. Can stack.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K107] to the opposing character that has taken the least DMG. Repeat this once for each stack you have, then reduce 1 stack. <color=#FFFFFFFF>Can stack</color>.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color> to the opposing character that has taken the least DMG. Repeat this once for each stack you have, then reduce 1 stack. <color=#FFFFFFFF>Can stack</color>.
